body:
I tried setting manually the material with this [Colour picker tool for radiance](http://www.jaloxa.eu/resources/radiance/colour_picker/index.shtml) This is my white opaque material Specularity = 0  Roughness = 0.2  Reflectance = 1 (I can't manage this parameter) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/x93ABI42iFVSfcM9cBjYbGjG-C4Ywu3MQHXJbOF9-yHY4*7eyZ0*uzvBdRFUeISXzZEefGRgcB0MvmpW82*vc3pBL3IgiG67/Screenshotatsept27102612.png) **void plastic identifier**
